channel.title: Connecting help
channel.description: I changed the ip my client connects to (myservernamehere.no-ip.org), i compiled and i try to log in and it says error connecting to server. after a few seconds. I port forwarded i tested it with PFportchecker from portforward.com and it says the port is open and i have no idea what to do. someone please help me PM me for my msn or just post here.

item.title: Connecting help
item.dc:creator: @Math_Class Math Class
item.description:
@Math_Class wrote:

[quote=“poop on u234, post:1, topic:387473”]I changed the ip my client connects to (myservernamehere.no-ip.org),
i compiled and i try to log in and it says error connecting to server. after a few seconds.
I port forwarded i tested it with PFportchecker from portforward.com and it says the port is open and i have no idea what to do. someone please help me PM me for my msn or just post here.[/quote]
Use “127.0.0.1” as the IP for your client, but use “myservernamehere.no-ip.org” when you distribute the client.

Read full topic
